verses.roman:
vṛṣṇeḥ sumitraḥ putro 'bhūd
yudhājic ca parantapa
śinis tasyānamitraś ca
nighno 'bhūd anamitrataḥ

synonyms: vṛṣṇeḥ—of Vṛṣṇi, the son of Sātvata; sumitraḥ—Sumitra; putraḥ—a son; abhūt—appeared; yudhājit—Yudhājit; ca—also; param-tapa—O king who can suppress enemies; śiniḥ—Śini; tasya—his; anamitraḥ—Anamitra; ca—and; nighnaḥ—Nighna; abhūt—appeared; anamitrataḥ—from Anamitra.
translation: O King, Mahārāja Parīkṣit, who can suppress your enemies, the sons of Vṛṣṇi were Sumitra and Yudhājit. From Yudhājit came Śini and Anamitra, and from Anamitra came a son named Nighna.
